channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 'Grandpas' got together to help kids. Scientists say it boosts the elders' health, too
item.description: Older men can find themselves isolated after retirement. Volunteer groups like Grandpas United are good for both physical and mental health.

item.title: Watch: U.S. intelligence leaders testify in House after Signal flap
item.description: The use of civilian software to discuss sensitive military and government matters came to light after a journalist from The Atlantic magazine said he ...

item.title: WATCH LIVE: NPR, PBS heads answer lawmakers' allegations of bias
item.description: The CEOs of the largest U.S. public broadcasting networks are appearing before a House subcommittee chaired by Republican Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene.

item.title: Supreme Court upholds Biden-era rule regulating ghost guns
item.description: The court said that ghost guns, which are virtually untraceable weapons that require assembly, are considered "firearms" and subject to ATF regulation...

item.title: DOGE says it needs to know the government's most sensitive data, but can't say why
item.description: DOGE staffers have skirted privacy laws, training and security protocols to gain virtually unfettered access to financial and personal information sto...

item.title: Tufts grad student taken into custody by federal agents in Somerville
item.description: A Tufts University international graduate student was taken into custody by federal authorities Tuesday, according to the school and her attorney.

item.title: The South African words now in the Oxford English Dictionary
item.description: The latest update includes "loan words" from several countries, including South Africa and Ireland.

item.title: A year after the Baltimore bridge collapse, a long road to recovery is ahead

item.title: 3/26: CBS Morning News
item.description: NSA warned of vulnerabilities in Signal app a month before Houthi strike chat; Survey finds 50% of parents financially support adult children.

item.title: Supreme Court upholds Biden-era ghost gun rule
item.description: The Supreme Court was considering a challenge to a 2022 regulation that sought to regulate ghost guns.

item.title: At secret test-flight facility, Ukraine's drone makers fear energy ceasefire won't hold
item.description: Ukraine long-range drone makers are worried Russia will use the ceasefire to gather strength and attack again.

item.title: JD Vance will join wife in Greenland but trip scaled back
item.description: Greenland's leaders have criticised planned visits by US officials after Trump's threats to annex the island.

item.title: Russia says sanctions must be lifted before Ukraine maritime ceasefire can start
item.description: Moscow and Kyiv appear at odds over when and how the US-brokered deal will come into effect.

item.title: At least 24 dead in South Korea's 'worst ever fires'
item.description: The wildfires are threatening cultural sites and "rewriting the record books", according to authorities.

item.title: Watch Live: Intel chiefs testify before House panel as new Signal texts emerge
item.description: Director of National Intelligence Tulsi Gabbard and CIA Director John Ratcliffe are back on Capitol Hill to testify before the House Intelligence Comm...

item.title: Trump aims to overhaul U.S. elections in executive order with new requirements

item.title: Pilot and 2 young daughters survive the night on airplane wing after crashing into icy Alaska lake
Gunman who killed 23 in racist attack at Texas Walmart is offered plea deal to avoid death penalty
